mapper.sql: b_book_reader_id, b_book_no, b_reader_no, b_user_no, b_borrow_date, b_return_date, b_over_date, is_return_book, b_renew_frequency, b_renew_time
mapper.select: select rb.b_book_reader_id,b.b_book_name,r.b_reader_name,a.b_admin_name from t_book_reader rb,t_book b,t_reader r,t_admin a where rb.b_book_no=b.b_book_no and rb.b_reader_no=r.b_reader_no and rb.b_user_no=a.b_admin_no order by rb.b_book_reader_id limit #{currentIndex},#{pageSize}

select rb.b_book_reader_id,b.b_book_name,r.b_reader_name,a.b_admin_name from t_book_reader rb,t_book b,t_reader r,t_admin a where rb.b_book_no=b.b_book_no and rb.b_reader_no=r.b_reader_no and rb.b_user_no=a.b_admin_no

select
distinct
from t_book_reader
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_book_reader (b_book_reader_id, b_book_no, b_reader_no, b_user_no, b_borrow_date, b_return_date, b_over_date, is_return_book, b_renew_frequency, b_renew_time) values (#{bBookReaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bBookNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bReaderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bUserNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bBorrowDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bReturnDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bOverDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isReturnBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bRenewFrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bRenewTime,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_book_reader
b_book_reader_id,
b_book_no,
b_reader_no,
b_user_no,
b_borrow_date,
b_return_date,
b_over_date,
is_return_book,
b_renew_frequency,
b_renew_time,
#{bBookReaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bBookNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bReaderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bUserNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bBorrowDate,jdbcType=DATE},

#{isReturnBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_book_reader
b_book_reader_id = #{record.bBookReaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
b_book_no = #{record.bBookNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
b_reader_no = #{record.bReaderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
b_user_no = #{record.bUserNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
b_borrow_date = #{record.bBorrowDate,jdbcType=DATE},
b_return_date = #{record.bReturnDate,jdbcType=DATE},
b_over_date = #{record.bOverDate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_return_book = #{record.isReturnBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
b_renew_frequency = #{record.bRenewFrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER},
b_renew_time = #{record.bRenewTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update t_book_reader set b_book_reader_id = #{record.bBookReaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_book_no = #{record.bBookNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_reader_no = #{record.bReaderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_user_no = #{record.bUserNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_borrow_date = #{record.bBorrowDate,jdbcType=DATE}, b_return_date = #{record.bReturnDate,jdbcType=DATE}, b_over_date = #{record.bOverDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_return_book = #{record.isReturnBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_renew_frequency = #{record.bRenewFrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_renew_time = #{record.bRenewTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}
